title: Physical education: children aged 4 to 6 years
brief_description: This documentary runs through the set guidelines established by the Board of Education work schedule for infants’ first school year. Instructed in the development through free activity, independent action self control, lightens, flexibility and alertness. Based on he Board of Eduction syllabus of physical education for school, 1933.
